creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: profile of female angel gliding on cloud with wings outstretched, blowing a long horn; PR arm extended with fingers pointing to inscribed banner above
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, Stamp

-- in graphite on recto at bottom right: 27685 | L.D. 15 | RR.11 
-- in graphite on recto at bottom left: [Ange Agenouille sur des Nuages]
-- sticker on verso, lower left, stamped MADE IN FRANCE
markings: blue stamp on verso, lower left: Alexis Hubert Rouart (Lugt 2187a)
provenance: Alexis Hubert Rouart (1839-1911), Paris, sale in 1911; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
signed: signed and inscribed in plate, at top: [Eaux fortes, par Eug. Delacroix]
title: Angel Kneeling on Clouds
